name: 12Games12Weeks - 1 - Racing
description:
Racing Game build for my 12 Games in 12 Weeks Challenge.  Making 12 Minimal Viable Product level games in 12 weeks.

Challenge information here: https://12games12weeks.blogspot.com/

Controls:

Keyboard -> WASD or Arrow keys to move, esc for menu

X-box Joystick -> left stick to move, start for menu
